name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: YouTube Dislike and IMDb forum restorer

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Restores forums to IMDb and you can continue posting to them on filmboards.com and restores dislike counts for YouTube videos

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This addon restores dislike counts to YouTube videos and restores the forums removed from IMDb and you can continue posting to them on filmboards.com.
Not affiliated with imdb.com.
